name: Dogpile
rulesText: Discard your opponent's above monster if its level is less than the number of monsters you control.
flavorText: "The "prey" of meadow wolf packs typically find themselves incapacitated under a heap of fluff and slobber."

name: Meadow Sunset
rulesText: End the battle, then end the turn.
flavorText: "When playtime is over, a blanket of darkness soothes the creatures of the land into peaceful rest."

name: Herd's Bounty
rulesText: Draw a card for each monster you control.
flavorText: "At sunrise, every tree and bush bears ripe fruit; by sunset, every creature is full and happy."

name: Playtime!
rulesText: Your monsters get +3p this turn.
flavorText: "While not as strong or skilled as the monsters of other lands, few can keep up with an excited herd of meadow critters."

name: Bearhug
rulesText: Fading 3 (When your turn starts: Put a time counter on this. When the 3rd time counter is placed: Discard this.)
As long as you control a monster in the above zone, your opponent's above monster can't move or attack.

name: Carrier Pidgeon
rulesText: Swiftstep (this monster can move to non-adjacent zones)
When this monster moves: You can move one other card to an empty zone adjacent to that card.

name: Howling Pup
rulesText: Team Attack (When your adjacent monster attacks: You can spend this monster's attack to add its power to the adjacent monster this turn)

name: Sky Rabbit
rulesText: Swiftstep (this monster can move to non-adjacent zones)
When summoned: Draw 2 cards, then discard a card from your hand.

name: Cloud Sheep
rulesText: Your other monsters get +1p.

name: Rowdy Cub
rulesText: When this attacks, if you control another monster: This gets +2p this turn.

name: Gale Falcon
rulesText: Swiftstep
When summoned: You can discard your opponent's above spell.

name: Affectionate Wolf
rulesText: When summoned: Recover up to two Lv1 monsters.
flavorText: "The bounty and tranquility of the whale has fostered camaraderie between different animals over the centuries."

name: Cultivating Bear
rulesText: Guardian (When your adjacent monster is attacked: You can swap this card's position with it and continue the attack)
When summoned: Draw a card.

name: Whale Calf
rulesText: Swiftstep
If you control 2 or more other monsters, this can move and attack twice per turn.

name: Outnumber
rulesText: If you control more monsters than your opponent, discard one card in this column.

name: Whirlwind
rulesText: For each other card on the field, you can move it to an adjacent zone.

name: Rolling World
rulesText: Discard all cards on the field.
flavorText: "When the whale rolls, the ecosystem takes years to recover.

name: Rainbow Garden
rulesText: Fading 3
Your above monster gets +3p.

name: Sky Drop
rulesText: Fading 4
When your opponent's card(s) are discarded: Banish them.
flavorText: "Nothing that falls from the whale is ever seen again."

name: Wings of Power
rulesText: Fading 3
Your above monster gets +2 Power and has swiftstep (it can move to non-adjacent zones). When it moves, you can move this to the empty Spell Zone below it.

name: Glorious Anthem
rulesText: Fading 3
Your monsters get +3p.

name: Crumbling Soil
rulesText: When an above monster attacks: Discard all cards in this column.

name: United Courage
rulesText: When your above monster is attacked, if you control another monster: Your above monster gets +5p this turn for each other monster you control, then discard this.
